level.heading: Board authorized to further restrict hours of operation.
level.text: At the time of initial application or renewal of any class of license, the Board may further limit the hours of sale and delivery for a particular applicant (1) based on the Board's findings of fact, conclusions of law, and order following a protest hearing, or (2) under the terms of a voluntary agreement.
